org.deeplearning4j.optimize

Class OutputLayerTrainingEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.optimize.OutputLayerTrainingEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, TrainingEvaluator

    public class OutputLayerTrainingEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrainingEvaluator
    An output layer training evaluator uses a multi layer networks output and score functions to determine if training iterations should continue
    See Also:
